text:
Edman Ayvazyan (, 10 August 1931 – 25 March 2020) was an Iranian-Armenian painter. He was born in Tehran.
Career.
Ayvazyan focused on Daredevils of Sassoun, the works of Hovhannes Tumanyan, and created many portraits, landscapes, seascapes. His works can be found in many churches and museums including Lazar galley, House-Museum of Aram Khachaturian.
Ayvazyan died on 25 March 2020 in London, England, aged 88.
